original_text: Then King Joram commanded, ‘Prepare my chariot for me.’ So they brought his chariot to him. Then King Joram of Israel and King Ahaziah of Judah rode out of the city to meet Jehu. Each king was riding in his own chariot. They met Jehu at the piece of land that had once belonged to Naboth, the man from Jezreel.
korean_text: 요람이 이르되 메우라 하매 그의 병거를 메운지라 이스라엘 왕 요람과 유다 왕 아하시야가 각각 그의 병거를 타고 가서 예후를 맞을새 이스르엘 사람 나봇의 토지에서 만나매

sentences.original_text: So they brought his chariot to him
Then King Joram of Israel and King Ahaziah of Judah rode out of the city
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 이스라엘의 요람 왕과 유다의 아하시야 왕이 성에서 나와

sentences.original_text: Each king was riding in his own chariot
sentences.korean_translation: 각 왕은 자신의 전차를 타고 있었다

sentences.original_text: They met Jehu at the piece of land
that had once belonged to Naboth
